name: Crystillya - Boundless [Brackeys Jam 2020.1]
description:
Welcome to the vast world of Crystillya

Meet Touka Mica (15),  a short, intelligent girl belonging to the Mica family. Her ability, known as "Divine Confinement", is able to halt the passage of time in a specific area of her choosing.

And Naoki Mica (17), a pure strategist, blood sibling of Touka also from the Mica family. With the ability known as "Reality Bender", he can open holes in space, bending two points closer to each other, essentially working as a means of teleportation.

Both siblings have their differences and issues with one another, however when unexpected circumstances required both of them to travel to other worlds in search of a cure for Touka's rare condition, the bond of their blood guides them through space and time, fortifying their trust, reliability, and love.

Disclaimer: Crystillya: Boundless is a game made for Brackeys 2020.1 GameJam, it is based on the Crystillya universe, written by Beyluta. Visit their website if you wish to know more about the story.

Credits to people who created the game during those 7 days
